body:
I talk to brottweiler the staff member and I commeted that saids "
I promise not to use any other ones account ever again in my whole life I am being honest and trust."  He didn't respond back to _iGhosty and he closed the appeal that means that _iGhosty is banned for the whole life.  He loved that server because he accidently pressed james pak and got banned for ban evading.

replies.body:
You have to stop this. They locked your other post for a reason. Avicus staff can't do anything, let him appeal again or talk to a staff member

I don't mean to sound rude but it's not the staffs problem on avicus, I would recommend asking around on OCN

Since this appears to be a recurring theme: if you continue, you will receive a punishment.
